hero.title: Turn your <swap>LinkedIn</swap> posted links into <youtube>YouTube</youtube> subscriber magnets
hero.description: pim.ms links generated for your YouTube channel convert much more viewers into new subscribers. Smart links that converts on mobile where others fail.

form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

problem.title: The mobile conversion killer
problem.description: Standard links of your YouTube videos sabotage your subscriber growth

more.1: Links open in browsers where viewers are not logged into YouTube (in app or mobile browser)
more.2: Complicated login steps frustrate potential subscribers
more.4: Result: Lost engagement and monetization opportunities

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: PIMMS converts viewers into subscribers with direct links to your YouTube videos

more.1: pim.ms links open instantly your videos in the official YouTube app on viewers' phones (Apple store or Google Play)
more.2: Viewers stay engaged because they're already logged in
more.3: As a result, you get much more subscribers and engagement

offer_details.title: Early access to PIMMS
offer_details.description: Convert more viewers with our app-linking technology - start with 3 free direct links today.
